001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import static java.lang.ModuleLayer.defineModulesWithOneLoader;
004import static java.lang.module.Configuration.resolveAndBind;
005
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DirectoriesToolProvider;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ExecuteProcessToolProvider;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.GrabToolProvider;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolFinderSupport;
010import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
011import java.nio.file.Path;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.ServiceLoader;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
016
017/** A finder of tool providers. */
018@FunctionalInterface
019public interface ToolFinder extends ServiceFinder<ToolProvider> {
020
021  @Override
022  default String nameOf(ToolProvider provider) {
023    return provider.name();
024  }
025
026  static ToolFinder of(ToolProvider... providers) {
027    return new ToolFinderSupport.ToolProviderToolFinder(List.of(providers));
028  }
029
030  static ToolFinder of(ModuleFinder finder, boolean assertions, String... roots) {
031    var parentClassLoader = ClassLoader.getPlatformClassLoader();
032    var parentModuleLayer = ModuleLayer.boot();
033    var parents = List.of(parentModuleLayer.configuration());
034    var configuration = resolveAndBind(ModuleFinder.of(), parents, finder, Set.of(roots));
035    var layers = List.of(parentModuleLayer);
036    var controller = defineModulesWithOneLoader(configuration, layers, parentClassLoader);
037    var layer = controller.layer();
038    if (assertions) for (var root : roots) layer.findLoader(root).setDefaultAssertionStatus(true);
039    return ToolFinder.of(layer);
040  }
041
042  static ToolFinder of(ModuleLayer layer) {
043    var loader = ServiceLoader.load(layer, ToolProvider.class);
044    return new ModuleLayerServiceFinder<>(layer, loader)::findAll;
045  }
046
047  static ToolFinder of(ClassLoader loader) {
048    return ToolFinder.of(ServiceLoader.load(ToolProvider.class, loader));
049  }
050
051  static ToolFinder of(ServiceLoader<ToolProvider> loader) {
052    return new ServiceLoaderServiceFinder<>(loader)::findAll;
053  }
054
055  static ToolFinder ofPrograms(Path directory, Path java, String argsfile) {
056    return new ToolFinderSupport.ProgramsToolFinder(directory, java, argsfile);
057  }
058
059  static ToolFinder ofLayers(Path directory) {
060    return new ToolFinderSupport.LayersToolFinder(directory);
061  }
062
063  static ToolFinder ofBach() {
064    return ToolFinder.of(
065        new DirectoriesToolProvider(), new ExecuteProcessToolProvider(), new GrabToolProvider());
066  }
067
068  static ToolFinder ofSystem() {
069    return ToolFinder.of(ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader());
070  }
071
072  static ToolFinder compose(ToolFinder... finders) {
073    return new ToolFinderSupport.CompositeToolFinder(List.of(finders));
074  }
075}
